CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK( Appt_Start_Date__c ),"",
IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_Start_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_Start_Date__c - 7/24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_Start_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_Start_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( Appt_Start_Date__c - 7/24 ), 15, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_Start_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM")
+ " - " +
IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_End_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_End_Date__c - 7/24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_End_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_End_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( Appt_End_Date__c - 7/24 ), 15, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Appt_End_Date__c - 7/24), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ))
CustomField.label: Appt Window Time
